alert.note: Alert for Bradford (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 11:18PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Bradford and northern Alachua Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1118 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gainesville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Starke, Keystone Heights, Alachua, University Of Florida, New River, Orange Heights, Gainesville Airport, Sampson and Waldo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
